statements: UPDATE ProductionLineData SET efficiency_score = 0.85, production_date = '2022-10-20' WHERE production_id = 1;
UPDATE ProductionLineData SET product_name = 'Product XYZ', production_time = '08:30:00' WHERE production_id = 2;
UPDATE ProductionLineData SET efficiency_score = 0.85, production_time = '08:30:00' WHERE production_id = 101 AND product_name = 'Product A'

UPDATE production_line_data SET production_quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE efficiency_analysis SET efficiency_score = 0.85, process_step = 'Packaging' WHERE analysis_id = 5;
UPDATE production_line_data SET production_quantity = 1000, production_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE efficiency_analysis SET efficiency_score = 0.85, completion_time = '2022-11-20 08:00:00' WHERE analysis_id = 3
UPDATE production_line_data SET quantity=100, efficiency=0.85 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE machine_data SET location='Warehouse A', status='Active' WHERE machine_id=3;
UPDATE production_line_data SET quantity = 100, efficiency = 90.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE machine_data SET status = 'Maintenance', location = 'Workshop' WHERE machine_id = 3;
UPDATE production_line_data SET efficiency = 0.85 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE product_details SET description = 'New description added' WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE production_line_data SET efficiency = efficiency * 1.1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE product_details SET description = 'New description' WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE production_line_data SET quantity = 1000, is_defective = False WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE efficiency_metrics SET efficiency_score = 0.95, production_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE metric_id = 3;
UPDATE production_line_data SET product_name = 'Product A', quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE employee_data SET position = 'Manager', department = 'IT' WHERE employee_id = 101;
